::: Hell Beast quickly reads the data that Doublepunch has sent to him. He is 
extreamly happy with the success of the task. :::

::: Hell Beast turns to Pheniox ::: Save this data for future reference, and 
send a transmission to Doublepunch telling him if he needs to engage, do it, 
But try not to get scrapped.

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set and Ominous Prime stalk the cliffs that look down on the Cybertronian 
Fire. :::

::: Ominous ::: Its Maximal alright, and we might be able to use it to get 
back home.

::: Set ::: Listen, I have no intention of going home now. Koga and I are on 
a mission. You want to get home so you can take over. Well, I hate to tell 
you, but that isnt going to happen.

::: Ominous glares at Set ::: Got screw yourself rich boy. Im a soldier, not 
a posh socialite!

::: With that, Ominous takes off into the sky, turns to Set, and fires a bolt 
of energy at him. Set dodges, but dosent return fire because ominous is now 
here in sight. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron looks to Darkmouse ::: You and Quickstrike go and meet our new 
predacon neighbors. I want to make a first impression on them. Ra, 
Waspinator, Stingtra, and Quicksrike remain here. 

::: Megatron starts to head out. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Rat trap looks to Shredder with a frown ::: No, you idiot! You will ruin 
my plans!

::: After taking the shots which send him skidding across the rocky ground, 
Rat Trap fumbles with a blaster, gets up running, and fires several shots 
before making contact with the Maximals from the cover of some of the debris 
of the Ark. :::

::: Rat Trap on comm to any Maximal ::: Someone, anyone, help! Im under 
attack! I just got out of the Predacon brig and i need help! Maximals help!
